All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Admin
Class representing an admin user.
Authenticator
The Authenticator class is responsible for managing user authentication and data management.
Availability
An enumeration representing the availability of a product.
Card
Represents a card with a card number, expiration date, status, and PIN.
CashOnDelivery
Class representing a cash on delivery payment method.
DataManager
Abstract class for managing data by uploading and loading data to/from files.
Ewallet
A class representing an e-wallet payment method.
Info
Represents the personal information of a user.
Inventory
The Inventory class manages the products and vouchers in the system.
Observer
The Observer interface for observing changes or data loading.
Order
The Order class represents an order.
Payment
Abstract class representing a payment.
PreviousOrders
The PreviousOrders class represents a collection of previous orders made by a user.
Product
The Product class represents a product in a store.
ShoppingCart
The ShoppingCart class represents a shopping cart containing products.
User
The User class represents a user in the system.
Voucher
The Voucher class represents a voucher that can be used for discounts or promotions.
